introduction: You can fill in a form online to start a claim for Jobseeker's Allowance. Then Jobcentre Plus will contact you to arrange a meeting at your local Jobcentre.
more_information:
You will need: 

* a phone number where you can be contacted
* financial, employment and education details for you and your partner, if you have one

You may also find it useful to have a copy of your P45 or P60 for tax details, but it is not essential.

**Remember**: once you start your new claim, make a note of your user ID and password - you'll then be able to return to a saved claim anytime within seven days.

You need to be:

* available for work, able to work and actively seeking work
* aged 18 years or over and below State Pension age
* working less than 16 hours a week on average
* in England, Scotland or Wales

[Northern Ireland: Jobseeker's Allowance](http://www.nidirect.gov.uk/index/money-tax-and-benefits/benefits-and-financial-support/employed-or-looking-for-work/jobseekers-allowance.htm "Jobseeker's Allowance in Northern Ireland"){:rel="external"}
